title: My Weapon is a Loli - Novel Updates
tags: Heroes   Loli   Male Protagonist   Sentient Objects   Sword And Magic   Unique Weapons
author: 愤怒的烽火
description: Reynold is one of the worst students of the [Traveler’s school] which trains students to protect the balance of [story worlds], supporting heroes behind their backs. In order to become stronger, he used all his [Traveller points] to exchange for a demonic blade which turned out to be a seemingly unreliable Loli, can the last placed Reynold really become stronger?>
